# The `VPRecipeBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> is a base class modeling a sequence of one or more output IR instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPRecipeBase</CodeBlock>

This class augments <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> with operands which provide the inverse def-use edges from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a>&#39;s users to their defs. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpuser/#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> is a base class modeling a sequence of one or more output IR instructions.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> owns the VPValues it defines through <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpdef">VPDef</a> and is responsible for deleting its defined values. Single-value recipes must inherit from VPSingleDef instead of inheriting from both <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> separately.

Definition at line 709 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
